channel.title: Run Problem :(
channel.description:
when ever i try and run a server it always says 'java' or 'JAVA' cannot be found as a internel or external code.
so i just use a restarter cause that works and so does the compilers.
but when i tried to run a client it automatically closes or says that up there again ^^
plz help me :(
p.s ive already set environmental variables[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 14, 2008, 07:12:08 am[/size][hr]nobody can help me i see :(
